snippet: The central question in the trial of Pedro Espada Jr., and his son, Pedro Gautier Espada, is whether their lavish lifestyles were financed by theft or were the perks of office.
abstract: Opening arguments are made in the trial of former state senator Pedro Espada Jr, and his son, Pedro Gautier Espada, accused of embezzling hundreds of thousands of dollars from nonprofit SoundView Health Care Network in the Bronx; central question of of the case is whether their lavish lifestyles were financed by theft or if they were perks of the office.
lead_paragraph: The central question in the trial of Pedro Espada Jr., and his son, Pedro Gautier Espada, is whether their lavish lifestyles were financed by theft or were the perks of office.

headline.seo: Espadas Lived Well, but Deny Theft From Soundview Network
